title: HELP!!! How to report outside of game.
body: Tell me, how do you even report players outside of the game. Like two people just send me a link telling me that riot decided to give out free mystery chest. The links were false and made to look like the real one so that if I'd sign in, they would take my password. I'm smart enough to not type in my password, but others might. How do I report these people? I tried to submit a request at Riot Game Support, but none of the requests were about scammers, c'mon dude.

replies.body:
Sending in a report via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) was the right path to take. I definitely encourage you to continue reporting those sending out phishing links.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I dont think it is possible or else you would probably have people constantly reporting famous players theyd never played with
